label: 左大臣
本: A Tale of Flowering Fortunes:  Annals of Japanese Aristocratic Life in the Heian Period (Volumes One and Two) . Stanford University Press . 1980
説明文: The Minister of the Left, as indicated by his alternative appellation, Ichi no Kami (First Lord, Prime Minister), was the legal head of the government, in overall charge of Daijōkan operations  (p. 798). [一の上、太政官]
